survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the financial management practices and challenges faced by freelancers, including budgeting, saving, and tax management.

questions.question_text: How long have you been working as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment respondents by experience level. Use a single-choice radio button for easy selection.

script.question_text: How long have you been working as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following financial tools do you use for managing your freelance income? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: This question identifies common tools used. Allow multiple selections to capture all relevant tools.

script.question_text: Which of the following financial tools do you use for managing your freelance income? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How do you primarily save for taxes as a freelancer?
answer_options: Set aside a percentage of each payment
I do not save specifically for taxes
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to understand tax-saving habits. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: How do you primarily save for taxes as a freelancer?
answer_options: Set aside a percentage of each payment
I do not save specifically for taxes

questions.question_text: What is your biggest financial challenge as a freelancer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture nuanced challenges. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What is your biggest financial challenge as a freelancer?

questions.question_text: Do you have a separate emergency fund for freelance income fluctuations?
answer_options: I am working on building one
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge financial preparedness. Use radio buttons.

script.question_text: Do you have a separate emergency fund for freelance income fluctuations?
answer_options: I am working on building one
